meanings.sent1: She recomputes the total to make sure it is correct.
meanings.sent2: He recomputes the sum of the numbers for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The student recomputes the answer and realizes a mistake.
meanings.sent4: The scientist recomputes the data to confirm the results.
meanings.sent5: Mom recomputes the recipe to adjust the ingredients.

meanings.definition: To perform a mathematical operation again.
meanings.sent1: The computer recomputes the equation to find the solution.
meanings.sent2: The accountant recomputes the figures to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The robot recomputes the numbers and sparks fly out!
meanings.sent4: The calculator recomputes the values with lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The mathematician recomputes the formula to check for errors.
